name: Insanejournal Tweak Sitescheme
description:
This style is designed to be used with the IJ Skins: Class Adder [http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/11289] Greasemonkey script. Note that it will *not* work on its own.

Based on snakeling's CSS here:  http://userstyles.org/styles/3132

Quick fix to change New Tweak sitescheme for insanejournal to white background; grey patches beneath logo are parts of .png image files.
